QuestData.Title: First Degree Mortar
QuestData.Description: Hey bud! Like explosions? Of course you do. Who doesn't like explosions?!$B$BI've got mortars set up on the ridge to the east to hold the naga back. Go forth, recruit. Mortar them... mortar them all! Ahahahah.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use a Goblin Mortar to slaughter 60 Spitelash Attackers.
QuestData.RewardText: Can you believe they PAY us to do this?
